rdf:Description.ns1:label: Campanula punctata
rdf:Description.ns1:abstract: Campanula punctata, the spotted bellflower, is a herbaceous perennial flowering plant in the bellflower family. It has leaves and stems which fall down at the end of the blooming season. Campanula is a Latin word that means "bell".Punkta is said to have the meaning of "with dots" and "joining a group".
